text: visvasigale, nim'ma sampadaneyallina sud'dha bhagavannu hagu navu nimagagi bhumiyinda utpadisuva belegala ondu bhagavannu (satkaryagalige) kharcu madiri. Mattu yavudannu svatah nivu kannu muccikollade svikarisalariro, antaha malina bhagavannu (hina vastugalannu, itararige) niduva sankalpa madabedi. Allahanu sarva apeksegalinda muktanagiruvanu mattu prasansege patranagiruvanembudu nimage tilidirali
